name: the stress test - demo
description:
"the stress test - demo" is a demonstration of the setting my upcoming game "the stress test" will take place in.

This release serves no particular purpose other than the one listed above.

"the stress test" is a narrative driven experience in which the player takes the part of an office worker, picked out of the bunch to experiment with a new, arguably weird, way to reduce the stress of the office life.

Things take an unexpected turn in this Stanley Parable-like adventure when the player defies the rules the Artificial intelligence S.T.A.N. has put in place.
